tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE recruitment_tool_integration (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 candidate_name VARCHAR(255),
 candidate_email VARCHAR(255),
 background_check_status VARCHAR(50),
 onboarding_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE candidate_information (
    candidate_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    candidate_name STRING,
    candidate_email STRING,
    candidate_phone STRING,
    background_check_status STRING,
    onboarding_status STRING
);

CREATE TABLE sourcing_candidates (
  candidate_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  candidate_name VARCHAR(255),
  candidate_email VARCHAR(255),
  creation_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE background_checks (
  check_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  candidate_id UUID REFERENCES sourcing_candidates(candidate_id),
  check_type VARCHAR(50),
  check_status VARCHAR(50),
  check_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE onboarding_processes (
  process_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  candidate_id UUID REFERENCES sourcing_candidates(candidate_id),
  process_status VARCHAR(50),
  process_start_date TIMESTAMP,
  process_end_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE candidates (
    candidate_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(20),
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE background_checks (
    check_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    candidate_id INT,
    check_type VARCHAR(50),
    result VARCHAR(50),
    date_completed DATE
);

CREATE TABLE onboarding_tasks (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name VARCHAR(100),
    description TEXT,
    due_date DATE,
    is_completed BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE documents (
    doc_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    candidate_id INT,
    doc_type VARCHAR(50),
    file_path VARCHAR(255),
    uploaded_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE interviews (
    interview_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    candidate_id INT,
    interviewer_name VARCHAR(100),
    scheduled_datetime TIMESTAMP,
    feedback TEXT
);
